snippet: Gaza militants have long used tunnels to attack Israel. A recent incursion led to the discovery of dozens, the Israeli military said.
abstract: Israeli military says it has uncovered 10 tunnels with 22 exit points and that there are dozens more spread around Gaza; attack from underground tunnel near Sufa kibbutz near Gaza border prompted Israeli ground invasion; residents of kibbutz were shaken by attack, even though they are accustomed to living under threat.

byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren and Irit Pazner Garshowitz contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Gaza militants have long used tunnels to attack Israel. A recent incursion led to the discovery of dozens, the Israeli military said.

headline.seo: Hamas Tunnels Prompted Invasion of Gaza
headline.main: Trouble Underfoot on Israeli Kibbutz Near the Border
headline.print_headline: Trouble Underfoot on Israeli Kibbutz Near the Border
